patthana16.24:1.1_0: Akusalaṁ upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.24:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.24:3.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
